Text: Ofcourse its an american invention.... that there had been many 'machine guns' in the past doesnt matter. right...
Yeah um I think they mean the first modern machine gun to shoot bullets. Not the Chinese rockets strapped to a log and not Davinci's repeating crossbow, but one that shoots bullets.
Well, Pether, if you feel you have a case, post some specifics, not sniveling generalities and simplistic anti-Americanism.
